author: antonio
msg: Remove commented legacy code. It has been commented for more than 2 years.

author: rgrabowski
msg: Fix for LOG4NET-59 to allow rolling files based on UTC time. Implemented by adding DateTimeStrategy property which accepts an IDateTime. RollingFileAppender contains two IDateTime inner-class implementations: LocalDateTime (DateTime.Now) and UniversalDateTime (DateTime.UtcNow).

author: antonio
msg: Sync with cocoon 2.1.9. This works with older cocoon versions too.

author: felicity
msg: since we've reenabled the razor2 plugin, update the docs to reflect that
